agreement: This agreement will be placed below the questions and above the Enroll button. When this field is set, the button will say 'Agree & Enroll'. When the field is empty it will only say 'Enroll'. You could put text like this here: Please read this carefully: SVs will work for approximately 14 hours during the conference.

did_attend_before.description: How many times have you attended this conference before?

did_sv_before.description: How many times have you been an SV at this conference before?
did_sv_before.hint: You can always put a hint if you want to explain something

are_you_local.description: Are you local to where the conference will be this year?
are_you_local.hint: If you get selected as a volunteer you may be requested to do specific tasks that leverage that characteristic, like finding restaurants, helping with the Information desk, help with PC meeting, and others.

do_you_need_a_visa.description: Do you need to apply for a travel visa in order to attend this conference? (answer no if you are eligible for a VISA waiver program for the country of the conference)
do_you_need_a_visa.hint: Choosing yes will make us send you some additional information via E-mail. This preference will not be used when the lottery is run for selecting the SVs.

why_you_want_to_be_sv.description: Please explain why you want to be an SV at the conference:

something_else.description: You can also make a field optional by not using the 'required' keyword
something_else.value: The 'value' is always the default value when the form gets show for the first time to the SV

header: This will be above all questions. It could say: Please answer the following questions
